price: ߞߋߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߲ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߐ߲߫ ߖߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߗߋߣߍ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߟߋ߬
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
